The type must derive from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至``項目之下設定``項目。Corresponds to the `` element that is configured under the `` element. ``項目會註冊簽發者權杖解析程式。The `` element registers an issuer token resolver. 這可用來還原序列化 SAML 權杖時解析簽發者金鑰識別碼子句。This can be used to resolve Issuer key identifier clauses while deserializing a SAML token.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan MaximumClockSkew { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.MaximumClockSkew : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定為此識別組態項目所設定的最大時鐘誤差。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum clock skew that is configured for this identity configuration element.
The maximum clock skew.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 `` 項目的 `maximumClockSkew` 屬性。Corresponds to the `maximumClockSkew` attribute of the `` element. 執行時間緊迫的作業，例如驗證登入工作階段的到期時間時，控制最大允許的時鐘誤差。Controls the maximum allowed clock skew when performing time-sensitive operations, such as validating the expiration time of a sign-in session.

span.span: <identityConfiguration>

to save the ; otherwise, .

summary.span: 取得或設定與這個識別組態項目相關聯的 。

value.span: 此項目會指定是否啟用語彙基元重新執行偵測，以及指定語彙基元重新執行快取中語彙基元的最大有效期限。
